course.title: Pathophysiologic Basis of Alterations in Health

notes.div: Course is taught through Extended Education & Outreach as a College Independent Study (CIS) course. This is an open enrollment course and not restricted to any specific term. Course offered on-line.

description.div: Focus on the pathophysiologic basis for selected alterations in health across the lifespan. Theories of disease causation will be explored. Acquired, immune, infectious, carcinogenic and genetic alterations in health in the body systems will be presented with an emphasis on etiology, cellular and systemic pathophysiologic response and clinical manifestations. Interdisciplinary management will be introduced.
